gameDetails.name: Snapshot
gameDetails.description:
From the introduction:
"Snapshot" is a wargame of close-action combat between individuals.  It's primarily inside starships of the far future. Snapshot is an adaptation and more detailed rendition of the personal combat rules from in Traveller, the science-fiction role playing game. 
Components include

    120 die-cut counters
    Detailed ship plans
    Weapons chart
    2 six-sided dice
    Rules and scenarios making the game playable with or without Traveller.
